sentence.Network_en: The streamer has been captured in running the blockade.

sentence.Network_en: Do not use a bit-image method of backup (like a tape streamer), because this will copy the virus.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要使用位元影像的方法（如磁带机）备份，因为这样会将病毒一起拷贝下来。

sentence.Network_en: This type of cable is generally referred to as a streamer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种电缆一般称为拖缆.
